snippet.title: [MAME] Janken Game Acchi Muite Hoi! (c)1995 Data East
snippet.description: This is a highly polished Rock Paper Scissors redemption type game running on Data East's Deco MLC platform,   It was dumped and emulated thanks to Phil Bennett, ShouTime, Surgeville, Sean Sutton, Jred, Mike Krug, Smitdogg & The Dumping Union.  I spent a while improving the Deco MLC emulation some years back, so it's good to see this holds up well.  This will be supported in the MAME 0.225 release
